name: Trampoline Jump with Friends
description:
*****Super Addicting Super Fun
*****I love it on my iPad and iPhone!!! Great Fun

Now with 11 new in game characters so you can enjoy jumping on your trampoline even more. Challenge your friends on Facebook and compete in Game Center with live Leader boards. You can practice in free play or challenge yourself even further in competitive mode.

*Universal App - Works on your iPad and iPhone or iPod
*Loads of characters to choose from !!!
*Optimized for iPhone 5, iPhone 5s and iOS 7
*Real Trampoline Physics


*****WE LOVE FEEDBACK*****
Request characters or in game options and we update our app to what our users want. Lets hear from you!!
